name: Color Shifter (Oleg_DJ)
description:
Bib woke up and decided to go for a walk. Already on a walk, he found an amazing artifact that had colors that he had never seen in his world. When Bib touched it, the artifact sent him into another universe where he would have to find his way home. Will you help him?

Controls

Controls are written in the game, but just in case:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Press buttons - E
  • Speed up clock - Q
  • Restart level - R
  • Quit game - ESCAPE (Windows Only)

Bugs you might find and what to do with them

We made this game for a game jam, and deadline was very near. Therefore, some bugs remained:

  • Stuck in the wall - Wait until the color changes to a different one and get out the same way / Restart level.
  • Died but still in fall position - Just restart level. You already died, so it wouldn't be fair if you ressurected.
  • Can't find the link at the end of the game that leads to the game rate - I just forgot to add it, sorry. Just follow this link: Rate Link.

If you found another bug - write about it in the comment.

Suite Pea and I were making this game for Snowy GameJam, so please rate our game.

P.S.: The Second Part of the game is here. ; )
